ing: 2 (3 ounce) packages orange flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a light and fruity orange dessert salad that is also cool and creamy!"
ins: Combine the well drained oranges and pineapple in a large bowl and mix together with the cottage cheese. Add the dry orange flavored gelatin powder and stir until well blended. Fold in the thawed frozen whipped topping and refrigerate for at least one hour.
